name: Vietnam War Zone
description:
Vietnam War Zone is set in March 1965, Johnson made the decision with solid support from the American public to send U.S. combat forces into battle in Vietnam.

Controls:

A & D to move 

Spacebar to jump

left click to shoot

Missing Features (this will be added in  the futures):

  • Sound Effect
  • Music

Bugs:

there is bug in ground tiled but not so many. but if you've found any please comment in the section below.

any feedback would be appreciate it.

Thank You.
